channel.title: [server]
channel.description:
what is the whole command for this Type style::.. ::server please stop doing that Chat style::.. [SERVER]: Please stop doing that
does anyone know that command setup for that, (508)

item.title: [server]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Add this to your admin commands:

else if (cmd[0].equals("svrmsg") && p.username.equals("username")) { for (Player pl : Engine.players){ p.frames.sendMessage(pl,"[Server]: "+ playerCommandU.substring(7)); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [server]
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

This is my ::yell setup , i get no errors, but it doesnt show up in game ???

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (p.muteType > 0) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You are muted and cannot yell until an administrator unmutes you."); return; } if (playerCommand.equals("warouxriot") || playerCommand.equals("warouxriot")) return; if (p.rights == 0) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "[Player] "+p.username+": "+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "[<img=0>] "+p.username+": <col=006400> "+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "[<img=1>] "+p.username+": <col=ff0000> "+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("warouxriot")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "[<img=1>][Owner] "+p.username+": <col=ff0000><shad=0202> "+playerCommand.substring(5));

am i right in saying if (playerCommand.equals("warouxriot") || playerCommand.equals("warouxriot")) return; is useless?

Read full topic

item.title: [server]
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

He’s looking for a 508 command, not 317.

item.title: [server]
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Try this,

if (command.startsWith("server") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights >= 3) { String text = command.substring(8); talk("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic

item.title: [server]
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

Basically the same thing as ::yell, but once you’re in there, replace the player name thing to just “[SERVER]:” if you have the yell command, copy it, and paste it under the brackets. Then just change the “p.username” or something like that, replace it with “[SERVER]:”.

Read full topic
